content.raw:
This added complexity is my biggest concern about this design. I currently know of two other pieces of software with their own sdformat parsers (dartsim and some IHMC code), and this would make things a bit harder for them. I remember @nkoenig saying that we wanted to avoid the example of Collada in being overly complex.

This isn't a `No` vote, just a concern.
